title: sAmbashivA enrE
sahitya:
sAmbashivA enrE bhaji nAvE sadAshiva shambhO shrI svayambhO


anupallavi

  pAmbaNiyum tirumEni azhaganai bhakta parAdhinanAna shankaranai


caraNam    akhilamellAm shuTri alaiginrAi aiyan Alayam valam vara azhuginrAi sukham
 virumbi eNNaTra tIvinai puriginrAi tunbam vandhAl andO enu pulambuginrAi
